attributes.additional_details: The government are asking members of the public to stay at home, only going out for necessary reason. This leaves nurseries in a impossible situation were parents are not bringing their children to nursery and listening to the government. Wit the government not funding nurseries if the children do not attend is unfair as this is not a financial situation nurseries could survive.
attributes.background: Guarantee funding for nurseries during the COVID pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567756
